testimonials.title: Real Results from Real LA Businesses

items.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
items.content: The AI voice agent books 40+ appointments daily and handles all our Spanish-speaking patients perfectly. It's like having 3 extra receptionists.

items.name: Miguel Rodriguez
items.content: Between reservations, takeout orders, and customer questions, the AI handles everything. Our staff can focus on service instead of the phone.

items.name: James Park
items.content: The workflow automation connected our inventory, orders, and shipping. What took 4 hours daily now happens automatically.
